name: histograms
description: A histogram is a graph that you can use to assess the shape and spread of continuous sample data

name: Scatter Plots
description: A Scatter (XY) Plot has points that show the relationship between two sets of data

name: Dot Plots
description: A Dot Plot is a graphical display of data using dots

name: Density Plots
description: A Density Plot visualises the distribution of data over a continuous interval or time period
